lst.str: The Interministerial Committee on Credit and Savings, headed by Treasury Minister Giovanni Goria, said its decision reflected the "need to safeguard the principle of separation between banks and non-financial concerns."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The value of credits given cannot exceed either one-fifth of the combined capital and reserves of the bank itself or two-fifths of the value of the stake owned in the bank by the group or individual concerned.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: With regard to bank holdings in companies, the Bank of Italy can exercise supervisory controls when information on a bank's consolidated activities show single shareholdings in a company or another bank of 25 pct or more, owned directly or indirectly.
